basic_calculator.name: basic_calculator
basic_calculator.prompt:
Create a sophisticated, responsive calculator with modern UI design.
**Instructions:**
- The entire output must be a single HTML file with all CSS and JavaScript inline.
- Design a sleek, modern calculator interface with a dark theme using gradients of charcoal and deep blue.
- Include all basic arithmetic operations (+, -, *, /), number buttons (0-9), decimal point, equals, and clear/all-clear buttons.
- The display should be large and clearly readable with a subtle inner shadow effect.
- Buttons should have hover effects with subtle color transitions and a pressed state animation.
- Implement proper calculation logic with error handling for division by zero and invalid operations.
- The calculator should be fully responsive, adapting beautifully from mobile (320px) to desktop (1200px+) screens.
- Use a clean, modern font like 'Segoe UI' or similar system fonts.
- Add keyboard support for all calculator functions.
basic_calculator.description: A sophisticated calculator with modern UI design
requirements: Number buttons (0-9), decimal point, equals, and clear functions
Error handling for division by zero and invalid operations
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

tic_tac_toe.name: tic_tac_toe
tic_tac_toe.prompt:
Create a fully functional Tic-Tac-Toe game with modern design.
**Instructions:**
- The entire output must be a single HTML file with all CSS and JavaScript inline.
- Design a clean, modern game interface with a fresh color scheme.
- Implement complete game logic including win detection for rows, columns, and diagonals.
- Add player turn indicators, score tracking, and game status display.
- Include a reset/new game button to start fresh.
- The game should handle all edge cases (draws, invalid moves).
- Add smooth animations for moves and win celebrations.
- Make it responsive and visually appealing on all devices.
tic_tac_toe.description: A complete Tic-Tac-Toe game with modern design
requirements: Complete game logic with win detection
Player turn indicators and status display

personal_portfolio.name: personal_portfolio
personal_portfolio.prompt:
Create a stunning personal portfolio website with modern design.
**Instructions:**
- The entire output must be a single HTML file with all CSS and JavaScript inline.
- Design a professional portfolio showcasing projects, skills, and experience.
- Include sections: hero, about, projects, skills, contact.
- Add smooth scrolling navigation and interactive elements.
- Implement a dark/light theme toggle.
- Include hover effects on project cards and skill bars.
- Add a functional contact form with validation.
- Make it fully responsive and optimized for all devices.
- Include micro-interactions and attention to detail.
requirements: Multiple sections (hero, about, projects, skills, contact)

contact_form.name: contact_form
contact_form.prompt:
Create a sophisticated contact form with advanced validation.
**Instructions:**
- The entire output must be a single HTML file with all CSS and JavaScript inline.
- Design a professional contact form with modern UI.
- Include fields: name, email, subject, message, phone (optional).
- Implement comprehensive client-side validation with helpful error messages.
- Add real-time validation feedback as users type.
- Include a character counter for the message field.
- Add form submission handling with success/error states.
- Implement accessibility features and ARIA labels.
- Make it fully responsive and keyboard accessible.
contact_form.description: A sophisticated contact form with advanced validation
requirements: Multiple input fields with proper types

todo_app.name: todo_app
todo_app.prompt:
Create a feature-rich todo application with modern design.
**Instructions:**
- The entire output must be a single HTML file with all CSS and JavaScript inline.
- Implement complete CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete).
- Add task filtering (All, Active, Completed).
- Include priority levels with color coding.
- Add due dates and task descriptions.
- Implement local storage for data persistence.
- Add search functionality to filter tasks.
- Include bulk actions (mark all complete, clear completed).
- Add smooth animations and transitions.
todo_app.description: A feature-rich todo application with data persistence

react_todo_app.name: react_todo_app
react_todo_app.prompt:
Create a modern React todo application using React 18+.
**Instructions:**
- Create a multi-file React project using Create React App structure.
- Implement hooks (useState, useEffect, useReducer) for state management.
- Add TypeScript for type safety.
- Include comprehensive testing with React Testing Library.
- Add routing with React Router.
- Implement component composition and prop drilling patterns.
- Add custom hooks for reusable logic.
- Include proper error boundaries and loading states.
- Follow React best practices and design patterns.
react_todo_app.description: A modern React todo application with TypeScript and testing
requirements: State management with useReducer or Context

vue_dashboard.name: vue_dashboard
vue_dashboard.prompt:
Create an analytics dashboard using Vue 3 Composition API.
**Instructions:**
- Create a Vue 3 project with Composition API.
- Use Pinia for state management.
- Implement data visualization with Chart.js or similar.
- Add responsive design with Tailwind CSS.
- Include real-time data updates with WebSocket simulation.
- Implement filtering and date range selection.
- Add component-based architecture with proper separation of concerns.
- Include Vue Router for navigation between dashboard sections.
- Add proper TypeScript support.
vue_dashboard.description: An analytics dashboard with Vue 3 and data visualization

nextjs_blog.name: nextjs_blog
nextjs_blog.prompt:
Create a modern blog platform using Next.js 13+ with App Router.
**Instructions:**
- Use Next.js 13+ with App Router and server components.
- Implement markdown content handling with MDX.
- Add SEO optimization with metadata API.
- Include static site generation for posts.
- Implement search functionality with Fuse.js or similar.
- Add dark mode support with proper theme switching.
- Include commenting system integration.
- Add analytics tracking and performance monitoring.
- Implement proper error pages and loading states.
nextjs_blog.description: A modern blog platform with Next.js and markdown support

svelte_portfolio.name: svelte_portfolio
svelte_portfolio.prompt:
Create an impressive portfolio website using Svelte 5 with runes.
**Instructions:**
- Use Svelte 5 with the new runes syntax ($state, $effect).
- Implement smooth animations and transitions using Svelte transitions.
- Add a content management system for easy updates.
- Include interactive project showcases with hover effects.
- Implement dark mode with CSS variables.
- Add a blog section with markdown support.
- Include contact form with form validation.
- Optimize for performance and SEO.
- Add accessibility features and ARIA support.
svelte_portfolio.description: A modern portfolio website using Svelte 5 with runes
